sub_title: Commercial Services & Logistics Coordinator at Roche Diabetes Care Nederland
summary:
I love working at an International and dynamic company, which acknowledges and applies talents. While being a constant factor within Order-to-Cash, I contribute to the optimization of compliant processes, implementation of new business models, and am not afraid to challenge Planning and Logistics to reach cost effective targets. 

With a pro-active, flexible and positive attitude it helps me to be a valuable asset within any organization.

Disciplines
Customer Contact, Order Management & Projects, Back-order Management, Demand Planning, Forecast Analysis, Financial Administration, System Management, Supply Chain Reporting, Business Partner, Logistics Service Management.

Goal: Continuity and optimization of all processes in order to drive Supply, Service, and Credibility to our customers, stakeholders and 3rd parties, while balancing costs and Business opportunities.

profile_positions.description:
•	Manage the supply chain to ensure maximum customer satisfaction against minimum cost.
•	BPO of the demand forecasting process incl. coordination of the Local Demand Review, Monthly Forecast Analysis, verification and reporting to stakeholders.
•	Works closely with Marketing and Business Development to develop creative and optimal material management and contracting strategies for current and new business models by translating complex supply chain challenges into pragmatic logistic solutions.
•	Design and run continuous improvement processes on Operations and switching from critical operational issues to structural process thinking.
•	Key user Forecasting Tool for multiple Management Centers.
•	Manage and optimize order handling incl. 
   o	Logistical Claim overviews.
   o	Inform customers and colleagues of necessary back order information.
   o	Solve and prioritize during back order related issues and unwanted situations.
   o	Monthly sharing the results from order and logistic flow to different stakeholders.
•	As SAP Key user Sales & Distribution, assure an up and running system according the business and legal requirements, acting as a contact person for change management, assuring a proper testing and incident management.
•	Manage service level of local cross dock (transport & warehouse) by defining, initiating and leading process improvement projects with local cross dock.
•	Participate on national and international projects related to logistics. For this jobs/courses can take place abroad.
•	Evaluate, update and improve procedures and work instructions.
•	Provide management information to internal and external customers, based on (statistical overviews).
•	Function as a back-up of the Commercial Services Employee.
•	Function as a back-up of the Business Administrator Salesforce.com
•	Supporting financial administration with credit collection, price verification and logistic cost analysis.
profile_positions.title: Commercial Services & Logistics Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
1. Correct and efficient processing of orders, invoicing and creditation including monitoring and troubleshooting imperfections/errors in ERP, CRM and interfaces. Inform internal and external stakeholders in a proactive way and manage expectations. If needed, contact with third parties.
2. Proper registration and customer-oriented, pro-active monitoring and responding to inquiries, complaints and information to end users RDCNL or internal colleagues.
Responsible for the logging, monitoring and reporting of Logistical Complaints.
3. Manage the collection process in line with the approved credit policy.
4. Supporting the workflow approval at the moment of contract creation, ensuring 4eyes principle at entry of obligations and liabilities of the contract. Take a proactive role in the monitoring of the contract clauses and inform involved stakeholders in time for action.
5. Managing/testing (changes in) the relevant processes in ERP, CRM or other software tools. Act as a key user in area of responsibility for SAP assuring an up and running system according the business and legal requirements, acting as a contact person for change management, assuring a proper testing and incident management.
6. Act as a business partner and give advice in area of expertise. Saveguarding business continuity by organizing back-up within Commercial Services.
7. Creation and maintenance of Customer Master Data in ERP system, coordinates with the Business controller (finance fields) and if needed with the SDFC Business Administrator resulting in complete and correct customer master data. Review pricing conditions, check if conditions are in line with the contract clauses.
